product_name: Feedback Sports Pro Ultralight Repair Stand
long_description: This extremely lightweight repair stand is built to professional standards yet weighs only 10.5 lbs. for convenient travel and compact storage. Slide-Lock clamp has an internal clutch which quickly opens and closes with quarter-turn action. Non-leverage clamp design won't crimp tube and has 360deg rotation. Hinged clamp arm folds for convenient transport and storage, so stand fits in tight places. Rugged tripod design offers maximum stability and allows wrenching on flat or uneven surfaces. Rubber foot caps enhance grip on all surfaces and won't fall off. Stand holds up to 65 pounds on uneven surfaces like dirt, grass and slopes. Quick-release levers for height adjustment and easy tripod setup. Triple anodized extruded 6005-aluminum tubing is extremely durable and very lightweight.
short_description: This extremely lightweight repair stand is built to professional standards yet weighs only 10.5 lbs. for convenient travel and compact storage.
